headings.usage: All H1-H3 headings. MUST use tracking-tight (-0.02em).
headings.instructions: Import from Google Fonts. Do NOT use Inter for headings.

body.instructions: Use 'font-light' (300) for large paragraphs to create elegance.

mono.usage: Data points, financial metrics, code snippets.

layout_system.spacing_scale: Generous. Use p-8, p-12, p-24. Avoid cramped p-4.

grid_strategy.marketing: The Tetris Grid (Mode A). Asymmetrical. 12-col grid. Mix col-span-4, col-span-8.
grid_strategy.dashboard: High Density Grid (Mode B). 4-col grid. Tight gaps (gap-4).

buttons.primary: bg-[#D4AF37] text-black font-semibold rounded-none hover:bg-[#E5C158] transition-all uppercase tracking-widest text-xs px-8 py-4
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border border-white/20 text-white rounded-none hover:border-[#D4AF37] hover:text-[#D4AF37] transition-all uppercase tracking-widest text-xs px-8 py-4

inputs.style: bg-transparent border-b border-white/20 rounded-none px-0 py-4 focus:border-[#D4AF37] focus:ring-0 transition-all placeholder:text-white/20

visual_enhancers.texture: Add a fixed 'noise' overlay at 3% opacity to the entire body background.
visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use backdrop-blur-xl for sticky headers and modals.
visual_enhancers.borders: Use 1px borders with low opacity (10%) for structure. Do not rely on shadows.
visual_enhancers.glow_effects: Use 'Tracing Beam' effect on key feature cards.

motion.transitions: All hover states must be duration-300 ease-out.
motion.entrance: Staggered fade-in-up for all grid items.

hero_background.usage: Hero section background with heavy dark overlay (opacity 80%)

tech_stack_instructions.file_extension: Use .js and .jsx ONLY. Do NOT use .ts or .tsx.

universal_guidelines: Do NOT use gradients for text.
Do NOT use rounded-xl or rounded-2xl. Keep radii small (rounded-sm or rounded-md) for a 'sharp' premium feel.
Ensure all text has sufficient contrast. Use #EDEDED for primary text, not #FFFFFF (too harsh).
implementation_steps: 2. Update tailwind.config.js with the new color palette.
3. Create a 'Layout' component that includes the Lenis scroll wrapper and Noise overlay.
4. Build the Landing Page using the 'Tetris Grid'.
5. Build the Dashboard View using the 'High Density Grid'.
